text:
I'd like to shout out to <@U01QVR44MEY> — I've been meaning to reach out to carter for a bit because I see him active here, and finally shot him a message and we chatted for a bit. 

Anyways, I'm grateful he's around here answering people’s questions and going above and beyond

I'd like to also throw some gratitude towards <@U7SL518D6>  — Jon has always been such a calming voice since the first time I met him. He's always on top of his game and I'm super glad he's a developer advocate. Jon came through with a perfect answer, excatly what the doctor ordered and it just solved so many things. Thanks Jon
True true, Jon is one of the best
You do a lot more than me Nick!
Jon is best. Much love Jon. Very excite. Much wow
